See also: frage

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German frāga. More at frain.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfʀaːɡə/
  • (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Frage f (genitive Frage, plural Fragen)

  1. question (interrogative sentence or phrase)
  2. question, issue (subject or topic for consideration or investigation)
  3. question, doubt (challenge about the truth or accuracy of a matter)

Declension[edit]

indef.def.noundef.noun

Antonyms[edit]
